meaningMnemonic: The <radical>tree</radical> <radical>pirate</radical> jumps from a tree and attacks you by hitting you with a <kanji>pillow</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: As he hits you with his <kanji>pillow</kanji> he makes a demand: "Give me your <reading>Mac cooler</reading> (まくら). He wants the device that cools down your Mac computer.
